Package org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner

Class KnowledgeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.KnowledgeBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Statement>
    public class KnowledgeBase
extends Object
implements Iterable<Statement>
    A knowledge base with rules, facts, and declarations for loading data from further sources. This is a "syntactic" object in that it represents some information that is not relevant for the semantics of reasoning, but that is needed to ensure faithful re-serialisation of knowledge bases loaded from files (e.g., preserving order).
    Author:
    Markus Kroetzsch

      • getRules

        public List<Rule> getRules()
        Get the list of all rules that have been added to the knowledge base. The list is read-only and cannot be modified to add or delete rules.
        Returns:
        list of Rules

      • getFacts

        public List<Fact> getFacts()
        Get the list of all facts that have been added to the knowledge base. The list is read-only and cannot be modified to add or delete facts.
        Returns:
        list of Facts

      • getDataSourceDeclarations

        public List<DataSourceDeclaration> getDataSourceDeclarations()
        Get the list of all data source declarations that have been added to the knowledge base. The list is read-only and cannot be modified to add or delete facts.
        Returns:
        list of DataSourceDeclarations

      • getStatements

        public Collection<Statement> getStatements()
        Returns all Statements of this knowledge base. The result can be iterated over and will return statements in the original order. The collection is read-only and cannot be modified to add or delete statements.
        Returns:
        a collection of statements
